item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Sing-Along, Sean Baker-Produced ‘Left-Handed Girl,’ Locarno Winner Set for Busan Film Festival
item.description: The big South Korean festival will open with director Park Chan-wook’s ‘No Other Choice.’
